controller

Class AdminThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AdminThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class AdminThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    AdminThread implements Runnable so that it can be run as a thread

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  AdminThread.CalendarListActionListener
      Actionlistener for calendarlist panel DeleteBtn calls admin method deleteCalendar with the selected calendar BackToMainBtn returns to menu panel
      private class  AdminThread.EventListActionListener
      Actionlistener for eventlist panel DeleteBtn calls admin method deleteEvent with the selected event and admin credential BackToMainBtn returns to menu panel
      private class  AdminThread.LoginActionListener
      Actionlistener for login panel LoginBtn calls authenticate method in switchmethods class
      private class  AdminThread.MainActionListener
      Actionlistener for main panel AdminBtn opens up a new frame with login panel for admin TerminateBtn terminates the server
      private class  AdminThread.MenuActionListener
      Actionlistener for admin menu panel CalendarListBtn shows calendarlist panel and calls admin method calendarTable EventListBtn shows eventlist panel and calls admin method eventsTable NoteListBtn shows notelist panel and calls admin method notesTable UserListBtn shows userlist panel and calls admin method userTable
      private class  AdminThread.NoteListActionListener
      Actionlistener for notelist panel DeleteBtn calls admin method deleteNote with the selected note BackToMainBtn returns to menu panel
      private class  AdminThread.UserListActionListener
      Actionlistener for userlist panel AddBtn calls admin method addUser with the typed username and password (these cannot be empty) DeleteBtn calls admin method deleteUser with the selected user BackToMainBtn returns to menu panel
